contentJson: ["Paul, a prisoner of Jesus Christ, and Timothy our brother, unto Philemon our dearly beloved, and fellowlabourer,"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Paul, a prisoner of Jesus Christ, and Timothy our brother, unto Philemon our dearly beloved, and fellowlabourer,

contentJson: ["And to our beloved Apphia, and Archippus our fellowsoldier, and to the church in thy house:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: And to our beloved Apphia, and Archippus our fellowsoldier, and to the church in thy house:

contentJson: ["Grace to you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Grace to you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

contentJson: ["I thank my God, making mention of thee always in my prayers,"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: I thank my God, making mention of thee always in my prayers,

contentJson: ["Hearing of thy love and faith, which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus, and toward all saints;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Hearing of thy love and faith, which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus, and toward all saints;

contentJson: ["That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus.

contentJson: ["For we have great joy and consolation in thy love, because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee, brother."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love, because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee, brother.

contentJson: ["Wherefore, though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient,"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Wherefore, though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient,

contentJson: ["Yet for love’s sake I rather beseech thee, being such an one as Paul the aged, and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Yet for love’s sake I rather beseech thee, being such an one as Paul the aged, and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ.

contentJson: ["I beseech thee for my son Onesimus, whom I have begotten in my bonds:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus, whom I have begotten in my bonds:

contentJson: ["Which in time past was to thee unprofitable, but now profitable to thee and to me:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable, but now profitable to thee and to me:

contentJson: ["Whom I have sent again: thou therefore receive him, that is, mine own bowels:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Whom I have sent again: thou therefore receive him, that is, mine own bowels:

contentJson: ["Whom I would have retained with me, that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Whom I would have retained with me, that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel:

contentJson: ["But without thy mind would I do nothing; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity, but willingly."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: But without thy mind would I do nothing; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity, but willingly.

contentJson: ["For perhaps he therefore departed for a season, that thou shouldest receive him for ever;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season, that thou shouldest receive him for ever;

contentJson: ["Not now as a servant, but above a servant, a brother beloved, specially to me, but how much more unto thee, both in the flesh, and in the Lord?"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Not now as a servant, but above a servant, a brother beloved, specially to me, but how much more unto thee, both in the flesh, and in the Lord?

contentJson: ["If thou count me therefore a partner, receive him as myself."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: If thou count me therefore a partner, receive him as myself.

contentJson: ["If he hath wronged thee, or oweth thee ought, put that on mine account;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: If he hath wronged thee, or oweth thee ought, put that on mine account;

contentJson: ["I Paul have written it with mine own hand, I will repay it: albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand, I will repay it: albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides.

contentJson: ["Yea, brother, let me have joy of thee in the Lord: refresh my bowels in the Lord."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Yea, brother, let me have joy of thee in the Lord: refresh my bowels in the Lord.

contentJson: ["Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee, knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee, knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say.

contentJson: ["But withal prepare me also a lodging: for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: But withal prepare me also a lodging: for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you.

contentJson: ["There salute thee Epaphras, my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: There salute thee Epaphras, my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus;

contentJson: ["Marcus, Aristarchus, Demas, Lucas, my fellowlabourers."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Marcus, Aristarchus, Demas, Lucas, my fellowlabourers.

contentJson: ["The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
